General.Name: Beijing New Universal Science and Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: New Universal Science and Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of intelligent equipment in China and internationally. The company offers intelligent conveying batching equipment, including intelligent mixer machine system, rubber mixing intelligent control system, carbon black, powder automatic weighing batching, feeding system, fully automatic small material batching weighing system, and dilute phase single tube pneumatic conveying system. It also provides green environmental protection equipment, which include rubber industrial waste gas treatment equipment, industrial dust treatment equipment, and boiler flue gas desulfurization and denitrification treatment equipment; intelligent digital display control and storage equipment, comprising intelligent digital display and control systems, and storage software and hardware equipment; intelligent equipment for recycling silicon materials; and intelligent special equipment, which comprise intelligent cracking devices, intelligent robots, intelligent ski machines, intelligent bullet cabinets and safes, and broadcasting and television equipment. The company was formerly known as Beijing New Universal Science and Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to New Universal Science and Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2020. New Universal Science and Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
